citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 12:50pm on
December 17, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee when they arrived at the facility, but the inspector
was informed the licensee was away for the day and was not immediately available by phone. Failure to provide access to
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may
result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 12:50pm on 
December 17, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee when they arrived at the facility, but the inspector 
was informed the licensee was away for the day and was not immediately available by phone. Failure to provide access to 
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may 
result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
